pages.title: Getting Started with Altars
pages.text: Stone Altar Tiles are an essential part of most any ritual. These blocks can be placed in a pattern to fit most any ritual note. Altar tiles can be right-clicked with an item to slot the item into it. Different ritual recipes will require a different assortment of items.

pages.title: Crafting Altar Tiles
pages.text: Altar Tiles are fairly cheap to craft, and only require some basic resources as well as a few Lesser Soul Essences to make.
